title: Stuck in Game Abandoned - you have left a game in progress. Please reconnect
body: Stuck in Game Abandoned - you have left a game in progress. Please reconnect i can t play anymore because this message apper all the time ...what i should do ?

replies.body: It sounds like this was a ghost game, which happens if the match can't tell the server that it ended.  You can usually force that communication through relogging or waiting about an hour.  Everything should be okay now!
